item.title: Anti Flooding Help! (I will tripple rep you)
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

MY error i keep getting: server.java:178: error: cannot find symbol if(System.currentTimeMillis() - list.get(connectingHost) > 3000) { ^ symbol: method get(String) location: variable list of type ConnectedList Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

I know you guys don’t spoon feed, but please just once? I really would appreciate anyone helping me, i mean i really need help.

[size=24pt]The program being used to spam my server logs players in as “null” over 100 times. It’s rather annoying.[/size]

So i tried transferring this peace of code to the server.java in my Allstarscape Source.

If ConnectionMap contains IncomingAddress If System.currentTimeMillis() - ConnectionMap.get(IncomingAddress) > 3000L //If the last connection is greater than 3 seconds Allow Connection Else Close Connection Else Allow Connection

Here is my public void run()

[code] public void run() {
// setup the listener
try {
shutdownClientHandler = false;
clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1,
null);
misc.println("- Allstar-Scape v1 -");
misc.println(" … Online!");
while (true) {
java.net.Socket s = acceptSocketSafe(clientListener);

            s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
            String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();

            if (/* connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) {
                if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing")
                        || connectingHost.startsWith("server2")) {
                    misc.println(
                            connectingHost
                                    + ": Checking if server still is online...");
                } else {
                    int Found = -1;

                    for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) {
                        if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) {
                            Found = ConnectionCount[i];
                            break;
                        }
                    }
					if (Found < 3) {
                        misc.println(
                                "Connection accepted from " + connectingHost
                                + ": " + s.getPort() + ".");

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - list.get(connectingHost) > 3000) {
playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);
} else {
System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!");
s.close();
}
} else {
s.close();
}
}
} else {
misc.println(
"ClientHandler: Rejected " + connectingHost + “:”
+ s.getPort());
s.close();
}
}

    } catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
        if (!shutdownClientHandler) {
            misc.println(
                    "Error: Unable to startup listener on "
                            + serverlistenerPort + " - port already in use?");
        } else {
            misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down.");
        }
    }
}[/code]

And i added a connectlist.java i ripped from holypkerz heres the file:

[code]import java.util.Vector;
import java.util.List;
public final class ConnectedList {

private static ConnectedList instance;
private List<String> list = new Vector<String>(500);

public static ConnectedList getInstance()	{
	if(instance == null)
		instance = new ConnectedList();
	return instance;
}

public void add(final String s)	{
	list.add(s);
}

public void remove(final String s)	{
	if(contains(s))
		list.remove(s);
}

public boolean contains(final String s)	{
	return list.contains(s);
}

}[/code]
